name: Root Info Solutions
description:
Root Info Solutions (commonly referred to as Rootinfosol) is a privately held digital technology company headquartered in London, UK. The company delivers technology consulting, product design, development and maintenance services.
The company works with a gamut of front-end and server-side technologies (HTML5, AngularJS, CSS3, Nodejs, etc.), databases (mongoDB, MySQL, Cassandra), cloud services (Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure and Rackspace), mobility resources (Android, Android TV, iOS, BlackBerry, ionic and Amazon Fire TV) and web and mobile analytics tools (Flurry Analytics, Google Analytics, Mixpanel, etc.)
The company follows Agile product development process with a mix of Scrum, XP and Kanban methodologies.
In addition to the UK-based office, the company has an offshore development centre in New Delhi, India. Collectively, Root Info Solutions has 50+ employees & 170+ clients.
